Product.ModelName:
Fallow Deer Sausages with Blackberry and Mead
1 x 500g pack (approx. 7 sausages)
Product.Summary: A seriously special venison sausage...
Product.Description: <p style="line-height: 110%;">A speciality venison sausage from Brett &ndash; these beautiful bangers contain a small amount of prime aged beef to keep them juicy. Predominantly made from Fallow and Sika deer, and enhanced by the addition of English blackberries and Cornish mead, these take some beating. A really excellent breakfast sausage.</p> <p style="line-height: 110%;">&nbsp;</p>

Product.Description: <p>A chipolata with a difference! This is our take on a North African classic.
